xwikidoc.name: ViewersSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin

use.name: use
use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki

xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #set($ok = $xwiki.ssx.use("Viewers.ViewersSheet")) #set($discard = $doc.use('Viewers.ViewersClass')) #set($discard = $services.localization.use('document', 'Viewers.ViewersTranslations')) #set($package = $doc.getValue("package")) (% class="xform half" style="float: left;" %) ((( ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_viewername">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('viewername', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('viewername') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_description">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('description', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('description') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_package">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('package', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('package') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_status">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('status', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('status') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_mode">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('mode', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('mode') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_type">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('type', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('type') #if($package && $package!="") (% class="viewers-download" %) ((( [[Download this WebViewer>>${package}||class="viewers-link viewers-download"]] ))) #end ))) (% class="xform half" style="float: right;" %) ((( ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_wrapperDeveloper">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('wrapperDeveloper', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('wrapperDeveloper') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_wrapperVersion">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('wrapperVersion', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('wrapperVersion') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_wrapperLicence">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('wrapperLicence', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('wrapperLicence') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_sourcecodeurl">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('sourcecodeurl', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('sourcecodeurl') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_developer">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('developer', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('developer') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_version">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('version', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('version') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_licence">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('licence', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('licence') ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_url">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('url', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('url') ))) (% class="clearfloats" %) ((())) (% class="xform" %) ((( ; <label for="Viewers.ViewersClass_0_details">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('details', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('details') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
